imdb.plot outline: Zoltan the Wolf Man is a new reality adventure documentary series about Zoltan Horkai premiering on Discovery Channel and Animal Planet that lets viewers get up close and personal with some of the most dangerous animals in show business. Zoltan is a wild animal specialist working as an animal trainer and coordinator for the film and television industry. His farm is the home for more than 100 animals including several packs of wolves, 3 bears, dozens of wild boars and deers and many other animals. Zoltan is the founder and head of the Horkai Animal Training Centre near Budapest, Hungary. He is also the go-to wild animal trainer for movie directors from all over the world. He is famous around the world for his training concept called 'Natural Motivation'. He has done animal casting and training for European and Asian films and commercials, as well as for Hollywood blockbusters. Zoltan the Wolf Man will give us an insight into Zoltan's work in the international film industry and also into the adventures he experiences day-by-day whilst living with more than a hundred wild animals. The up close footage of Zoltan and his animals will bring audiences closer to these predators more than ever. Mixing reality elements of everyday life on the farm, nature cinematography of the animals in their natural habitat, adventures of training on movie sets with Zoltan and his co-workers creates an entertaining reality documentary series on living and working with predators.
imdb.title: Zoltan, the WolfMan
plot: Zoltan The Wolf Man is a new TV Series airing on Discovery that lets viewers get up close and personal with some of the most dangerous animals in showbiz.::New Media Vision
